infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location in the background to automatically track business mileage for tax purposes, helping you maximize your deductions.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to track your business mileage for tax deductions.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to capture receipt photos for expense tracking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to attach receipt images to expenses.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow this app to use your location in the background to automatically track business mileage for tax purposes.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow this app to use your location to track your business mileage for tax deductions.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow this app to access your photos to attach receipts to expenses.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow this app to use your camera to capture receipt photos.
